title: Statement by the Press Secretary on S.1513 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 31, 2009

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on S.1513




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                            July 31, 2009  STATEMENT BY THE PRESS SECRETARY:  On Friday, July 31, 2009, the President signed into law:  S. 1513, which extends the authorizations of certain Small Business Administration programs until September 30, 2009.
